pullrequest.title: Added urdf gazebo extension option to disable fixed joint lumping

content.raw: I think it could be added to that tutorial, with a caveat that the parameter is new and will require `sdformat > 2.3` or whatever the version is. The tutorial system supports multiple tutorials based on gazebo version, but the `ros_urdf` tutorial only has one version, so we could just stick with that.
content.html: I think it could be added to that tutorial, with a caveat that the parameter is new and will require sdformat > 2.3 or whatever the version is. The tutorial system supports multiple tutorials based on gazebo version, but the ros_urdf tutorial only has one version, so we could just stick with that.
